SEARCH
Package ca.eshopexpress.service

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Service interface for managing users within the system. It includes operations for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting user data, as well as enabling and disabling user accounts.
Since:
2025-05-12

    • findAllUsers

      List<User> findAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all users

    • findUserById

      Optional<User> findUserById(Long id)
      Finds a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, otherwise empty

    • getUserOrThrow

      User getUserOrThrow(Long id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID or throws an exception if not found.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the user if found
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user is not found

    • findByFirstName

      List<User> findByFirstName(String firstName)
      Finds users by their first name using case-insensitive partial matching.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name to search for
      Returns:
      a list of users with the matching first name

    • findByLastName

      List<User> findByLastName(String lastName)
      Finds users by their last name using case-insensitive partial matching.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name to search for
      Returns:
      a list of users with the matching last name

    • findByCity

      List<User> findByCity(String city)
      Finds users based on the city they reside in.
      Parameters:
      city - the name of the city to search for
      Returns:
      a list of users living in the specified city

      Saves a new user or updates an existing one.
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to save or update
      Returns:
      the saved or updated user
